actions.text: House Committee on The Budget Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-369.
Committee on Rules Granted a Rule.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.295 Reported to House.
Laid on Table in House by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A concurrent resolution reaffirming the congressional budget for the United States Government as set forth in the First Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for the fiscal year 1982 (H. Con. Res. 115, Ninety-seventh Congress).

summary.text: Reaffirms the concurrent resolution on the budget most recently agreed to with respect to the fiscal year 1982 (H. Con. Res. 115, Ninety-seventh Congress).

titles.title: A concurrent resolution reaffirming the congressional budget for the United States Government as set forth in the First Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for the fiscal year 1982 (H. Con. Res. 115, Ninety-seventh Congress).
